description: This file defines an API endpoint for searching destinations, using FastAPI framework and SQLAlchemy for database interactions. It provides a GET route '/search' that performs a case-insensitive partial match search on destination names and cities, supporting pagination and returning a structured response.

classes.name: DestinationSearchResponse
classes.description: Schema for the paginated search results containing a list of destinations, total count, limit, and offset.

classes.name: DestinationSearchResult
classes.description: Schema for individual destination information returned within search results.

methods.name: DestinationSearchResponse search_destinations( q: str = Query( ..., min_length=1, description="Search query text (partial match; case-insensitive)", ), db: Session = Depends(get_db), limit: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of results to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of results to skip"), )
methods.description: API endpoint handler function that performs a search over destinations based on query string, implements pagination, and returns the search results or raises an HTTPException if input is invalid.

ctags.name: search_destinations
ctags.signature: ( q: str = Query( ..., min_length=1, description="Search query text (partial match; case-insensitive)", ), db: Session = Depends(get_db), limit: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Maximum number of results to return"), offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Number of results to skip"), )
